content.rendered:
Roomi only allows multiple rooms if they are at the same address.

If you have multiple bedrooms in your house or apartment for rent, please create a separate listing for each bedroom, you will require a listing credit for each room you are posting, you can only create or activate 2 listings for free.

The listings must include the photos of their respective bedrooms. Feel free to add photos of the other common areas, such as the bathroom, living room, and kitchen to each one to help it stand out. You should also state in your listing description that it is bedroom one of two, two of two, etc.
